original_text: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to Thessalonica, where was a synagogue of the Jews:
korean_text: 그들이 암비볼리와 아볼로니아로 다녀가 데살로니가에 이르니 거기 유대인의 회당이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia,
where was a synagogue of the Jews:
